column4: Hi. Can anybody help me with a little problem? I have an USB-IR-Receiver which is fully recognized is I plug it in. But it will not be recognized after restarting Ubuntu until I plug it out and replug it into another USB-Port. Anybody an idea how to fix this problem?
is your bios set to plug and play?
you think, I should try and switch to a 32-bit ubuntu?
